bill.summary: 3/12/1987--Introduced. Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1988 and 1989 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for FY 1988 and 1989 to carry out such Act. Requires that appropriations that exceed the amounts needed to fund Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, Incorporated shall be placed in reserve to cover currency losses in the future. Deletes the provision that earmarks specified amounts for transmitter facilities modernization. Changes the method of certification of service for retirement credit purposes of employees of specified broadcast entities.
